pageContext.claim: “We're losing anywhere from $25 billion to $50 billion with Canada, you know, even though Canada likes to say we have no deficit.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often focuses on trade in goods and leaves out trade in services. Factoring both in, the United States actually had a trade surplus of $8.4 billion with Canada in 2017, according to the Office of the U.S. Trade Representative.
